title: If the area under DP reservation to be handed over to MCGM (excluding the DP Road/Road set back) is
clause_text: If the area under DP reservation to be handed over to MCGM (excluding the DP Road/Road set back) is less than the required area of amenity as per this Regulation, then only the additional area required shall be provided for amenity
section: In Plots/lay-outs of the land admeasuring 4000 sq. m or more:
